name: Tank Battle 2018: Desert War
description:
You are the army commander of a military vehicle battalion in Iron Tank, command your heavy machine to strike the combatant heavy force with fast paced shooting. Use clever strategy to outsmart other armored vehicles with thunder force on the battlefield of world war.

Pilot a explosive heavy armored tank and destroy opponents to complete the objectives of your mission and unlock more challenging levels. Experience the real battlefields of military world in 3D and learn to become a military heavy machine’s commander.

FEATURES:
• Iconic World War Tanks
• Choose machine gun, flame thrower, heavy shells to destroy the enemy
• 10 Different battlefields to fight in
• Unlock more Tanks by completing mission & Earning Coins
• Action packed HD Graphics
• Smooth and Realistic controls
• Exciting and challenging Gameplay
• Free to Play Forever
• War music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
